mapper.select: SELECT quest.`id` AS id, quest.`client_id` AS clientId, quest.`quest_time` AS questTime, quest.`quest_types` AS questTypes, quest.`next_quest_time` AS nextQuestTime, quest.`comment` AS COMMENT, quest.`created_party_id` AS createdPartyId, quest.`created_time` AS createdTime, quest.`last_modified_time` AS lastModifiedTime FROM `t_quest`quest WHERE quest.`client_id` = #{id} AND quest.`created_time` = (SELECT MAX(quest.`created_time`) FROM `t_quest`quest WHERE quest.`client_id` = #{id} GROUP BY quest.`client_id`)
